titleStmt.title: A godly, zealous and learned sermon vpon the 18. 19. 20. 21. verses of the 10. chap. to the Romaines. Wherein is set foorth vnto vs the greate mercy of God in the calling of the Gentiles, and his iust iudgement in the reiecting of the vnbeleeuing Iewes, & vs also, if vve vvith like obstinancie contemne his profered mercies. By Frauncis Tayler preacher of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Tayler, Francis, preacher.

titleStmt.title: A godly, zealous and learned sermon vpon the 18. 19. 20. 21. verses of the 10. chap. to the Romaines. Wherein is set foorth vnto vs the greate mercy of God in the calling of the Gentiles, and his iust iudgement in the reiecting of the vnbeleeuing Iewes, & vs also, if vve vvith like obstinancie contemne his profered mercies. By Frauncis Tayler preacher of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Tayler, Francis, preacher.

publicationStmt.publisher: By T. D[awson] for Thomas Woodcocke,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon of the Gentiles called and the Iewes reiected.
Some print show-through and some pages stained.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
